message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $120.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original price. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer with $100 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while staying within my budget.
